dialogue.introduction: I'm aircraft carrier Souryuu. If you're making a carrier task force, count me in!
dialogue.library_intro: Aircraft carrier Souryuu. Starting from the Pearl Harbor attack, an important battle of the war, I became the flagship. Huh? Midway? What's that? Is it tasty?
dialogue.secretary2: Uh, um, the Type 99 CDBs'll fall out...
dialogue.secretary3: Excuse me, it'll interrupt the landing drill if you shake the ship too much...
dialogue.wedding: I'm… working hard, right? I'm being helpful, yeah? Hey, Admiral… what do you think of me?
dialogue.show_players_score: There's a telegram for you, Admiral.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: The Carrier Task Force is launching!
dialogue.equipment1: Thanks. With this, I won't lose to Hiryuu!
dialogue.supply: Thanks, with this I won't lose to Hiryuu.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Excuse me, I'm going to fix my make-up real quick.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oh, my flight deck... I'll be in for a while...
dialogue.docking_complete: The repairs on the docked ship are completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: There's a new force in the fleet.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned to the base.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: The aircraft are well-trained. Expect great things!
dialogue.air_battle: Right, let's go for the big ones!
dialogue.attack: Take care of the anti-air guard, too!
dialogue.night_battle: It's payback time now. All aircraft, launch!
dialogue.mvp: The glory of the First Carrier Task Force does not waver!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Hit on flight deck!? No way, it's going to blow!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Why is it the flight deck again?! It hurts!
dialogue.sunk: The fire on the flight deck, it won't go out... Sorry...
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, Happy New Year! This year, the 2nd Carrier Division will be in your care again!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Here you go, Admiral. Some chocolates from me, too. Don't eat too much just because you got a lot, okay?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Congratulation to you, Admiral! And to everybody else too! We're going to celebrate today right? Time to open the canteen!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Yay, it's Christmas! Isn't it great? Christmas trees, chicken...I love this atmosphere!
